verses.verse: נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֣ר <WH5020> Nebuchadnezzar מַלְכָּ֗א <WH4430> the king לְֽכָל־ <WH3606> unto all עַֽמְמַיָּ֞א <WH5972> people אֻמַיָּ֧א <WH524> nations וְלִשָּׁנַיָּ֛א <WH3961> and languages דִּֽי־ <WH1768> forasmuch [דָאֲרִין כ] (דָיְרִ֥ין <WH1753> dwell ק) בְּכָל־ <WH3606> in all אַרְעָ֖א <WH772> the earth שְׁלָמְכ֥וֹן <WH8001> Peace יִשְׂגֵּֽא׃ <WH7680> be multiplied

אָֽתַיָּא֙ <WH852> the signs וְתִמְהַיָּ֔א <WH8540> and wonders דִּ֚י <WH1768> which עֲבַ֣ד <WH5648> hath wrought עִמִּ֔י <WH5974> toward אֱלָהָ֖א <WH426> God [עִלָּיָא כ] (עִלָּאָ֑ה <WH5943> high ק) שְׁפַ֥ר <WH8232> it good קָֽדָמַ֖י <WH6925> I thought לְהַחֲוָיָֽה׃ <WH2324> to shew

אָת֙וֹהִי֙ <WH852> [are] his signs כְּמָ֣ה <WH4101> How רַבְרְבִ֔ין <WH7260> great וְתִמְה֖וֹהִי <WH8540> [are] his wonders כְּמָ֣ה <WH4101> and how תַקִּיפִ֑ין <WH8624> mighty מַלְכוּתֵהּ֙ <WH4437> his kingdom מַלְכ֣וּת <WH4437> kingdom עָלַ֔ם <WH5957> [is] an everlasting וְשָׁלְטָנֵ֖הּ <WH7985> and his dominion עִם־ <WH5974> [is] from דָּ֥ר <WH1859> generation וְדָֽר׃ <WH1859> to generation

אֲנָ֣ה <WH576> I נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֗ר <WH5020> Nebuchadnezzar שְׁלֵ֤ה <WH7954> at rest הֲוֵית֙ <WH1934> was בְּבֵיתִ֔י <WH1005> in mine house וְרַעְנַ֖ן <WH7487> and flourishing בְּהֵיכְלִֽי׃ <WH1965> in my palace

חֵ֥לֶם <WH2493> a dream חֲזֵ֖ית <WH2370> I saw וִֽידַחֲלִנַּ֑נִי <WH1763> which made me afraid וְהַרְהֹרִין֙ <WH2031> and the thoughts עַֽל־ <WH5922> upon מִשְׁכְּבִ֔י <WH4903> my bed וְחֶזְוֵ֥י <WH2376> and the visions רֵאשִׁ֖י <WH7217> of my head יְבַהֲלֻנַּֽנִי׃ <WH927> troubled

וּמִנִּי֙ <WH4481> I שִׂ֣ים <WH7761> made טְעֵ֔ם <WH2942> a decree לְהַנְעָלָ֣ה <WH5954> to bring קָֽדָמַ֔י <WH6925> before לְכֹ֖ל <WH3606> in all חַכִּימֵ֣י <WH2445> the wise בָבֶ֑ל <WH895> [men] of Babylon דִּֽי־ <WH1768> forasmuch פְשַׁ֥ר <WH6591> unto me the interpretation חֶלְמָ֖א <WH2493> of the dream יְהֽוֹדְעֻנַּֽנִי׃ <WH3046> me that they might make known

בֵּאדַ֣יִן <WH116> Then [עָלֲלִין כ] (עָלִּ֗ין <WH5954> bring in ק) חַרְטֻמַיָּא֙ <WH2749> in the magicians אָֽשְׁפַיָּ֔א <WH826> the astrologers [כַּשְׂדָּיֵא כ] (כַּשְׂדָּאֵ֖י <WH3779> Chaldean ק) וְגָזְרַיָּ֑א <WH1505> and the soothsayers וְחֶלְמָ֗א <WH2493> the dream אָמַ֤ר <WH560> told אֲנָה֙ <WH576> and I קֳדָ֣מֵיה֔וֹן <WH6925> before וּפִשְׁרֵ֖הּ <WH6591> unto me the interpretation לָא־ <WH3809> them but they did not מְהוֹדְעִ֥ין <WH3046> make known לִֽי׃

וְעַ֣ד <WH5705> But at אָחֳרֵ֡ין <WH318> the last עַל֩ <WH5954> came קָֽדָמַ֨י <WH6925> before me דָּנִיֵּ֜אל <WH1841> Daniel דִּֽי־ <WH1768> whose שְׁמֵ֤הּ <WH8036> whose name בֵּלְטְשַׁאצַּר֙ <WH1096> [was] Belteshazzar כְּשֻׁ֣ם <WH8036> according to the name אֱלָהִ֔י <WH426> of my god וְדִ֛י <WH1768> whom רֽוּחַ־ <WH7308> and in whom [is] the spirit אֱלָהִ֥ין <WH426> gods קַדִּישִׁ֖ין <WH6922> of the holy בֵּ֑הּ וְחֶלְמָ֖א <WH2493> the dream קָֽדָמ֥וֹהִי <WH6925> and before אַמְרֵֽת׃ <WH560> him I told

בֵּלְטְשַׁאצַּר֮ <WH1096> O Belteshazzar רַ֣ב <WH7229> master חַרְטֻמַיָּא֒ <WH2749> of the magicians דִּ֣י ׀ <WH1768> since אֲנָ֣ה <WH576> because I יִדְעֵ֗ת <WH3046> know דִּ֠י <WH1768> which ר֣וּחַ <WH7308> that the spirit אֱלָהִ֤ין <WH426> gods קַדִּישִׁין֙ <WH6922> of the holy בָּ֔ךְ וְכָל־ <WH3606> all רָ֖ז <WH7328> secret לָא־ <WH3809> or even אָנֵ֣ס <WH598> troubleth לָ֑ךְ חֶזְוֵ֨י <WH2376> me the visions חֶלְמִ֧י <WH2493> of my dream דִֽי־ <WH1768> which חֲזֵ֛ית <WH2370> that I have seen וּפִשְׁרֵ֖הּ <WH6591> and the interpretation אֱמַֽר׃ <WH560> thee tell

וְחֶזְוֵ֥י <WH2376> Thus [were] the visions רֵאשִׁ֖י <WH7217> of mine head עַֽל־ <WH5922> in מִשְׁכְּבִ֑י <WH4903> my bed חָזֵ֣ה <WH2370> was looking הֲוֵ֔ית <WH1934> become וַאֲל֥וּ <WH431> and behold אִילָ֛ן <WH363> a tree בְּג֥וֹא <WH1459> in the midst אַרְעָ֖א <WH772> of the earth וְרוּמֵ֥הּ <WH7314> and the height שַׂגִּֽיא׃ <WH7690> thereof [was] great

רְבָ֥ה <WH7236> grew אִֽילָנָ֖א <WH363> The tree וּתְקִ֑ף <WH8631> and was strong וְרוּמֵהּ֙ <WH7314> and the height יִמְטֵ֣א <WH4291> thereof reached לִשְׁמַיָּ֔א <WH8065> unto heaven וַחֲזוֹתֵ֖הּ <WH2379> and the sight לְס֥וֹף <WH5491> thereof to the end כָּל־ <WH3606> of all אַרְעָֽא׃ <WH772> the earth

עָפְיֵ֤הּ <WH6074> The leaves שַׁפִּיר֙ <WH8209> thereof [were] fair וְאִנְבֵּ֣הּ <WH4> and the fruit שַׂגִּ֔יא <WH7690> thereof much וּמָז֨וֹן <WH4203> and in it [was] meat לְכֹ֖לָּא־ <WH3606> for all בֵ֑הּ תְּחֹת֜וֹהִי <WH8460> under תַּטְלֵ֣ל ׀ <WH2927> had shadow חֵיוַ֣ת <WH2423> the beasts בָּרָ֗א <WH1251> of the field וּבְעַנְפ֙וֹהִי֙ <WH6056> in the boughs [יְדֻרוּן כ] (יְדוּרָן֙ <WH1753> dwell ק) צִפֲּרֵ֣י <WH6853> it and the fowls שְׁמַיָּ֔א <WH8065> of the heaven וּמִנֵּ֖הּ <WH4481> of it יִתְּזִ֥ין <WH2110> was fed כָּל־ <WH3606> thereof and all בִּשְׂרָֽא׃ <WH1321> flesh

חָזֵ֥ה <WH2370> was looking הֲוֵ֛ית <WH1934> in בְּחֶזְוֵ֥י <WH2376> in the visions רֵאשִׁ֖י <WH7217> of my head עַֽל־ <WH5922> upon מִשְׁכְּבִ֑י <WH4903> my bed וַאֲלוּ֙ <WH431> and behold עִ֣יר <WH5894> a watcher וְקַדִּ֔ישׁ <WH6922> and an holy one מִן־ <WH4481> from שְׁמַיָּ֖א <WH8065> heaven נָחִֽת׃ <WH5182> came down

קָרֵ֨א <WH7123> He cried בְחַ֜יִל <WH2429> aloud וְכֵ֣ן <WH3652> thus אָמַ֗ר <WH560> and said גֹּ֤דּוּ <WH1414> Hew down אִֽילָנָא֙ <WH363> the tree וְקַצִּ֣צוּ <WH7113> and cut off עַנְפ֔וֹהִי <WH6056> his branches אַתַּ֥רוּ <WH5426> shake off עָפְיֵ֖הּ <WH6074> his leaves וּבַדַּ֣רוּ <WH921> and scatter אִנְבֵּ֑הּ <WH4> his fruit תְּנֻ֤ד <WH5111> get away חֵֽיוְתָא֙ <WH2423> let the beasts מִן־ <WH4481> from תַּחְתּ֔וֹהִי <WH8479> under it וְצִפְּרַיָּ֖א <WH6853> and the fowls מִן־ <WH4481> from עַנְפֽוֹהִי׃ <WH6056> his branches

בְּרַ֨ם <WH1297> Nevertheless עִקַּ֤ר <WH6136> the stump שָׁרְשׁ֙וֹהִי֙ <WH8330> of his roots בְּאַרְעָ֣א <WH772> in the earth שְׁבֻ֔קוּ <WH7662> leave וּבֶֽאֱסוּר֙ <WH613> even with a band דִּֽי־ <WH1768> forasmuch פַרְזֶ֣ל <WH6523> of iron וּנְחָ֔שׁ <WH5174> and brass בְּדִתְאָ֖א <WH1883> in the tender grass דִּ֣י <WH1768> forasmuch בָרָ֑א <WH1251> of the field וּבְטַ֤ל <WH2920> with the dew שְׁמַיָּא֙ <WH8065> of heaven יִצְטַבַּ֔ע <WH6647> and let it be wet וְעִם־ <WH5974> [be] with חֵיוְתָ֥א <WH2423> the beasts חֲלָקֵ֖הּ <WH2508> and [let] his portion בַּעֲשַׂ֥ב <WH6211> in the grass אַרְעָֽא׃ <WH772> of the earth

לִבְבֵהּ֙ <WH3825> Let his heart מִן־ <WH4481> from [אֱנֹושָׁא כ] (אֲנָשָׁ֣א <WH606> man ק) יְשַׁנּ֔וֹן <WH8133> be changed וּלְבַ֥ב <WH3825> heart חֵיוָ֖ה <WH2423> and let a beast's יִתְיְהִ֣ב <WH3052> be given לֵ֑הּ וְשִׁבְעָ֥ה <WH7655> unto him and let seven עִדָּנִ֖ין <WH5732> times יַחְלְפ֥וּן <WH2499> pass עֲלֽוֹהִי׃ <WH5922> over

בִּגְזֵרַ֤ת <WH1510> [is] by the decree עִירִין֙ <WH5894> of the watchers פִּתְגָמָ֔א <WH6600> This matter וּמֵאמַ֥ר <WH3983> by the word קַדִּישִׁ֖ין <WH6922> of the holy ones שְׁאֵֽלְתָ֑א <WH7595> and the demand עַד־ <WH5705> to דִּבְרַ֡ת <WH1701> the intent דִּ֣י <WH1768> forasmuch יִנְדְּע֣וּן <WH3046> may know חַ֠יַּיָּא <WH2417> that the living דִּֽי־ <WH1768> forasmuch שַׁלִּ֨יט <WH7990> ruleth [עִלָּיָא כ] (עִלָּאָ֜ה <WH5943> high ק) בְּמַלְכ֣וּת <WH4437> in the kingdom [אֱנֹושָׁא כ] (אֲנָשָׁ֗א <WH606> of mankind ק) וּלְמַן־ <WH4479> it to whomsoever דִּ֤י <WH1768> forasmuch יִצְבֵּא֙ <WH6634> he will יִתְּנִנַּ֔הּ <WH5415> and giveth וּשְׁפַ֥ל <WH8215> it the basest אֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH606> of men יְקִ֥ים <WH6966> and setteth up [עֲלַיַּהּ כ] (עֲלַֽהּ׃ <WH5921> and ק)

דְּנָה֙ <WH1836> This חֶלְמָ֣א <WH2493> dream חֲזֵ֔ית <WH2370> have seen אֲנָ֖ה <WH576> I מַלְכָּ֣א <WH4430> king נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֑ר <WH5020> Nebuchadnezzar [וְאַנְתָּה כ] (וְאַ֨נְתְּ <WH607> as for thee ק) בֵּלְטְשַׁאצַּ֜ר <WH1096> O Belteshazzar פִּשְׁרֵ֣א ׀ <WH6591> the interpretation אֱמַ֗ר <WH560> declare כָּל־ <WH3606> all קֳבֵל֙ <WH6903> thereof forasmuch as דִּ֣י ׀ <WH1768> forasmuch כָּל־ <WH3606> all חַכִּימֵ֣י <WH2445> the wise מַלְכוּתִ֗י <WH4437> [men] of my kingdom לָֽא־ <WH3809> are not יָכְלִ֤ין <WH3202> able פִּשְׁרָא֙ <WH6591> unto me the interpretation לְהוֹדָ֣עֻתַ֔נִי <WH3046> to make known [וְאַנְתָּה כ] (וְאַ֣נְתְּ <WH607> as for thee ק) כָּהֵ֔ל <WH3546> [art] able דִּ֛י <WH1768> for רֽוּחַ־ <WH7308> for the spirit אֱלָהִ֥ין <WH426> gods קַדִּישִׁ֖ין <WH6922> of the holy בָּֽךְ׃

אֱדַ֨יִן <WH116> Then דָּֽנִיֵּ֜אל <WH1841> Daniel דִּֽי־ <WH1768> whose שְׁמֵ֣הּ <WH8036> whose name בֵּלְטְשַׁאצַּ֗ר <WH1096> [was] Belteshazzar אֶשְׁתּוֹמַם֙ <WH8075> was astonied כְּשָׁעָ֣ה <WH8160> hour חֲדָ֔ה <WH2298> for one וְרַעְיֹנֹ֖הִי <WH7476> and his thoughts יְבַהֲלֻנֵּ֑הּ <WH927> troubled עָנֵ֨ה <WH6032> spake מַלְכָּ֜א <WH4430> him The king וְאָמַ֗ר <WH560> and said בֵּלְטְשַׁאצַּר֙ <WH1096> Belteshazzar חֶלְמָ֤א <WH2493> the dream וּפִשְׁרֵא֙ <WH6591> or the interpretation אַֽל־ <WH409> let not יְבַהֲלָ֔ךְ <WH927> thereof trouble עָנֵ֤ה <WH6032> answered בֵלְטְשַׁאצַּר֙ <WH1096> thee Belteshazzar וְאָמַ֔ר <WH560> and said [מָרְאִי כ] (מָרִ֕י <WH4756> lord ק) חֶלְמָ֥א <WH2493> the dream [לְשָׂנְאַיִךְ כ] (לְשָֽׂנְאָ֖ךְ <WH8131> hate ק) וּפִשְׁרֵ֥הּ <WH6591> thee and the interpretation [לְעָרַיִךְ כ] (לְעָרָֽךְ <WH6146> enemy ק)

אִֽילָנָא֙ <WH363> The tree דִּ֣י <WH1768> which חֲזַ֔יְתָ <WH2370> that thou sawest דִּ֥י <WH1768> which רְבָ֖ה <WH7236> which grew וּתְקִ֑ף <WH8631> and was strong וְרוּמֵהּ֙ <WH7314> whose height יִמְטֵ֣א <WH4291> reached לִשְׁמַיָּ֔א <WH8065> unto the heaven וַחֲזוֹתֵ֖הּ <WH2379> and the sight לְכָל־ <WH3606> thereof to all אַרְעָֽא׃ <WH772> the earth

וְעָפְיֵ֤הּ <WH6074> Whose leaves שַׁפִּיר֙ <WH8209> [were] fair וְאִנְבֵּ֣הּ <WH4> and the fruit שַׂגִּ֔יא <WH7690> thereof much וּמָז֨וֹן <WH4203> and in it [was] meat לְכֹ֖לָּא־ <WH3606> for all בֵ֑הּ תְּחֹת֗וֹהִי <WH8460> under תְּדוּר֙ <WH1753> dwelt חֵיוַ֣ת <WH2423> which the beasts בָּרָ֔א <WH1251> of the field וּבְעַנְפ֕וֹהִי <WH6056> and upon whose branches יִשְׁכְּנָ֖ן <WH7932> had their habitation צִפֲּרֵ֥י <WH6853> the fowls שְׁמַיָּֽא׃ <WH8065> of the heaven

[אַנְתָּה כ] (אַנְתְּ־ <WH607> It thou ה֣וּא <WH607> It [is] thou ק) מַלְכָּ֔א <WH4430> O king דִּ֥י <WH1768> forasmuch רְבַ֖ית <WH7236> that art grown וּתְקֵ֑פְתְּ <WH8631> and become strong וּרְבוּתָ֤ךְ <WH7238> for thy greatness רְבָת֙ <WH7236> is grown וּמְטָ֣ת <WH4291> and reacheth לִשְׁמַיָּ֔א <WH8065> unto heaven וְשָׁלְטָנָ֖ךְ <WH7985> and thy dominion לְס֥וֹף <WH5491> to the end אַרְעָֽא׃ <WH772> of the earth
